LanguageData.BlockChanceDefualtDesc:
Deflection
The chance to block damage from attackers.

 Deflecting can only block attacks within 140 degrees in the direction that the wielder is facing.
This chance is based on the wielder's Melee skill and the armor rating of the shield.
